channel.title: ChickenScape Development [Recruiting]
channel.description:
[-----------------ChickenScape Development Team-----------------] [u]This Server is called ChickenScape because Chickens are going to be around the [b]HOLE[/b] server.[/u]
[b]Application[/b] [code] Job: MSN/way to Contact: Are you in another development: Age: [/code] [center] [Co-Owners] Get Admin ingame and forums: -Free [In-Game]Administrators: -Free -Free [Forum+In-Game]Administrators: PlayerManny2 Owner Ethan -Free [Forum]Global Moderators: -Free -Free -Free [Forum+InGame]Moderators: -Free Cruzer [InGame] Moderators: -Noob Slayerz Coders[Admin on forums and ingame] Owner Ethan -Free[/center]
You're post will be ignored if you do not post with an application. I will not ignore posts that Aren't [i]MAKE ME ADMIN![/i] I will read all other posts though.
[b]Upcoming Updates:[/b] Deleting the party hat drops. Working on specials now. Adding large bonus's for Dharoks full Deleting all the firecapes, party hats, masks etc from shops Making Jad-hits 99, Drop a party hat + firecape, He also will have 5k HP. [b]Recently added Updates:[/b] Added some chickens in the server Making chickens drop crackers at around christmas Added lag handler Edited so crackers crack 50/50 PartyHats on the person you use it on, it used to crack 100% on the player you crack it on a 2147M
[b]I need a forum maker+hoster!, You will get ingame admin and forums admin![/b]
